functions.title: Search and replace in a value
functions.tooltip: Replace all instances of a found string in your text with another value. (Tip: This can be empty to delete characters)

parameters.description: What value or text do you want to search and replace text in? (Tip: You would use '{{@varName}}' to enter a the variable 'varName'.)

parameters.display_name: String of characters to search for
parameters.description: What text exists in the Starting value that you want to replace?

parameters.display_name: Value to replace all instances found of the string of characters with.
parameters.description: What text do you watch to replace the found string of characters with in the Starting value?

functions.title: Browser back button
functions.tooltip: Simulates pressing the browsers back button.

functions.title: Browser forward button
functions.tooltip: Simulates pressing the browsers forward button.

functions.title: Save current URL to variable
functions.tooltip: Saves the current URL to variable.

functions.title: Choose time on MUI round time picker.
functions.tooltip: Click on a specific time in the front most visible Material UI round clock time picker.

parameters.description: Enter a number visible on the clock to click. (NOTE: The number to click MUST be visible on the clock or this step will not work.
